About the Company: Gujarat Craft Industries Ltd (GCIL)is one of the leading manufactures & exporters of P P Woven bag (polypropylene bags), P E Tarpaulin (plastic sheetings) in India. The company also supplies plastic tents for shelter purpose to Unicef, Red Cross, etc.The company`s product range includes PP / HDPE Woven Sacks,Polypropylene ( PP ) Fabric,Paper Coated HDPE Woven Sacks,Paper Laminated HDPE / PP Fabric,LL / LD / HMHD Liner,Polyethylene Sheets & Tarpaulin.
